job.title: Software Engineer, Performance
job.description: The Core Performance team builds the tools frameworks and infrastructure to enable a more performant Asana without sacrificing velocity The team both directly contributes to and empowers other Asana engineers in a common mission to make everything we build as fast and efficient as possible We leverage cuttingedge web performance technologies and methodologies and shape them to work within Asanas unique infrastructurebrbrWere looking for an experienced engineer to join us in making Asana as fast as possible Youll be able to directly contribute to high impact performance projects such as improving Asana pageload times as well as define and execute on a vision for what performance engineering looks like going forward through projects like codesplitting our Javascript bundle to reduce payload As a team our focus is balanced between having direct highleverage impact via contributing to performance projects directly as well as building out the supporting frameworks to enable other engineers at the company to write performant featuresbrbrstronguWhat Youll Achievebrustrongulli Design develop and ship key framework initiatives to enable other Asana engineers to develop performant features lili Take ownership of and shape how performance engineering is done at Asana lili Investigate and resolve high impact high complexity performance issues within the Asana product and infrastructure brliulstronguAbout Youbrustrongulli 2 years of software engineering experience ideally with some background in performance engineering or frameworks lili Excellent communication for both working with teammates and collaborating with other teams lili Curiosity to drive to the root cause of technically challenging problems and autonomy  initiative to drive those problems to resolution brliulstronguAbout UsbrbrustrongAt Asana were building a better way to work fueled by transparency inclusion and technology that is a force for positive change Asana is a work management platform that helps teams orchestrate their work from daily tasks to strategic initiatives so they can move faster and accomplish more with less For the past 5 years weve been named a top workplace including top 10 strongu Great Place to Work ustrong Best Small amp Medium Workplaces 1 Fortune Best Workplace in the Bay Area for four years in a row 8 Fortune Best Workplaces for Women 14 strongu Glassdoor Best Place to Work ustrong and one of strongu Irelands Best Workplaces ustrong After spending more than a year physically distanced we are safely and mindfully returning our global teams to inperson collaboration incorporating flexibility that adds hybrid elements to our strongofficecentric culturestrong  With offices all over the world we are always looking for curious collaborative and missiondriven people to help us enable the worlds teams to work together effortlesslybrbrWe believe in supporting people to do their best work and thrive and building a diverse equitable and inclusive company is core to our mission Our goal is to ensure that Asana upholds an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued whether they are applying for an open position or working at the company We welcome applicants of any educational background gender identity and expression sexual orientation religion ethnicity age citizenship socioeconomic status disability and veteran status
